consequences.item1: You will lose access to Tenzu.
consequences.item2: We will delete your personal data and your name will disappear from the platform.
consequences.item3: The content you've created and shared with other people will remain in the platform.

delete.consent: I understand that the deletion is final and there will be no way to restore my account.

confirm_dialog.only_owner_projects: You are the only owner for some projects
confirm_dialog.info_owner_projects: You can't delete your account while there is no other owner. You can promote another user to owner role

confirm_dialog.info_delete_workspace: Those workspaces will be deleted, along with the projects within it. To prevent this, you can invite somebody to be a workspace member.
confirm_dialog.only_member_project: You are the only member in some projects
